matcher.options: total (press ctrl(cmd) + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (method, path) (floor(increase(http_server_request_count_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])))
sum by (service) (floor(increase(http_server_request_count_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: total (press ctrl(cmd) + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sort_desc(sum(increase(http_server_request_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[$__range]) > 0) by (method, path))
sum(floor(increase(http_server_request_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[$__range])) > 0)

sum by (method, path) (irate(http_server_duration_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])) / sum by (method, path) (irate(http_server_duration_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m]))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_server_duration_bucket{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])) by (le, path, method))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(http_server_duration_bucket{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])) by (le, path, method))

sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls", status=~"2.."}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls", status=~"3.."}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls", status=~"4.."}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls", status=~"5.."}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))
sort_desc(sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[$__range]) > 0) by (status))

sum(increase(http_server_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls", status=~"[45].."}[5m])) by (method, path) / (sum(increase(http_server_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (method, path) > 0)
sort_desc(sum(increase(http_server_response_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls", status=~"[45].."}[$__range]) > 0) by (method, path, status))

panels.title: Response Status Error Count by (method, path, status) [selected range]

matcher.options: total (press ctrl(cmd) + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (net_peer_name) (floor(increase(http_client_duration_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[1m])))
sum by (service) (floor(increase(http_client_duration_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: total (press ctrl(cmd) + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sort_desc(sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[$__range]) > 0) by (net_peer_name))
sum(floor(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[$__range])) > 0)

sum by (net_peer_name) (irate(http_client_duration_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[1m])) / sum by (net_peer_name) (irate(http_client_duration_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[1m]))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_duration_bucket{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[1m])) by (le, net_peer_name))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(http_client_duration_bucket{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[1m])) by (le, net_peer_name))

sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", http_status_code=~"2..", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", http_status_code=~"3..", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", http_status_code=~"4..", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", http_status_code=~"5..", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) by (service))
sort_desc(sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[$__range]) > 0) by (http_status_code))

sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", http_status_code=~"[45]..", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) by (net_peer_name) / (sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[5m])) by (net_peer_name) > 0)

sort_desc(sum(increase(http_client_duration_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", http_status_code=~"[45]..", net_peer_name!~"$excluded_hosts"}[$__range]) > 0) by (net_peer_name))

panels.title: Response Status Error Count by (host, status) [selected range]

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (increase(info_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[5m]))
sum by (pod) (increase(warning_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[5m]))
sum by (pod) (increase(error_count_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[5m]))

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="deploy/$app", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
) > 0

sum (
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="deploy/$app", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
avg(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace", container="$app", pod=~"$pod"})
avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace", container="$app", pod=~"$pod"})
avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace", container="$app"})
